name: The Final Bit
description:
The Final Bit

Guide the Final Bit as far as you can, but watch out, if your bit runs out of charge, it's over. How far can you get?

A fresh take on a retro classic genre, control your bit with just one button. Simple, right? It's easy to learn, but hard to master, with each level the speed increases, giving you less time to think and react.

Created for the 2022 Opera GX Mobile Game Jam with the theme in mind of "Keep moving" and also "One-thumb game".

NOTE: Made primarily for mobile platforms, but is also playable on desktop (full screen advised).
